help.query: How do I build a query?
help.explore: How do I explore my results?

visualBuilderBanner.title: Search without STIX knowledge
visualBuilderBanner.content: Now you can search without previous knowledge of STIX in the Visual builder. Start a query by adding conditions that include an IP address, a URL, or a hashtag. You can also toggle between the Visual builder tab and the Advanced builder tab to learn how to write your own advanced queries.

visualBuilder.submitQueryShortcutDesc: Press Ctrl + Enter to run the query
visualBuilder.title: STIX
visualBuilder.placeholder: Click to create your query in the Visual builder
visualBuilder.incompleteErrorMessage: Incomplete statement, please press enter or return to input value to complete the statement.

value.label: Value
value.textInputPlaceholder: Type a value and press Enter to add, or press Shift + Enter to add multiple values respectively.
value.numberInputPlaceholder: Type multiple values, and then press Enter.

error.invalidEmail: Valid email address format example: username@company.com
error.invalidHex: Valid hex value should have even hexadecimal digits in [a-f0-9]
error.noValue: Please press enter or return to input value to complete the statement
error.invalidPort: Port value must be an integer between 0 and 65535

conditionSetOperators.and: {{queryText}} (The preceding and the following conditions must both be met.)
conditionSetOperators.or: {{queryText}} (Either of the preceding and the following conditions is met.)

queryTransformWarningModal.title: Your query cannot be converted.
queryTransformWarningModal.desc: Data Explorer cannot convert your query changes into the Visual builder. You can continue working in the Advanced builder, or you can discard the query changes and use the Visual builder instead.
queryTransformWarningModal.discard: Discard and open the visual builder

tooltips.errorStatus: A data source error has occurred. Check your data source configurations.
tooltips.warningStatus: This data source is busy processing other requests. Your queries have been placed in the queue.

editor.label: Enter query
editor.syntaxError: This query contains a syntax error.

placeholders.stix: Create a query for IPs, URLs, MD5 hashes, and more
placeholders.aql: Query all your QRadar sources with AQL

submissionStatus.error: Failed to submit query. Please try again.

errors.qb_unexpected_expression: Unexpected expression '{{0}}', an expression must be followed by an operator or a qualifier.
errors.qb_multiple_repeated_qualifiers: Multiple REPEATED qualifiers are not allowed.
errors.qb_multiple_within_qualifiers: Multiple WITHIN qualifiers are not allowed.
errors.qb_multiple_start_stop_qualifiers: Multiple START STOP qualifiers are not allowed.
errors.qb_value_not_allowed_timestamp_required: This value type is not allowed for this object path. A timestamp string is required.
errors.qb_value_not_allowed_value_required: This value type is not allowed for this object path. A $t(queryBuilder.stixPattern.primitiveTypes.{{0}}) is required.
errors.qb_type_expected_to_complete_expression: A $t(queryBuilder.stixPattern.primitiveTypes.{{0}}) is required to complete this expression.
errors.qb_unexpected_expression_did_you_mean: Unexpected expression '{{0}}'. Did you mean '{{1}}' instead?
errors.qb_value_expected_to_complete_expression: A value is required to complete this expression.
errors.qb_thl_variable_not_in_var_list: Kestrel variable provided is not in the list of valid variables
errors.qb_thl_props_after_var_required: Column name after variable is required
errors.qb_thl_column_not_in_column_list: Kestrel columns provided is not in the list of valid columns
errors.qb_thl_invalid_column_format: This is not a valid Kestrel column name

errors.badUdsCalloutNotAdmin: To use Data Explorer, a connected data source is required. Contact your administrator for assistance.
errors.gettingQueries: Failed to retrieve queries. Please contact your system administrator.
errors.pageNotFoundMessage: This page could not be found.

errors.ana_results_not_available: The query result is not yet available.
errors.ana_unable_to_calculate_metadata: The metadata for the result cannot be processed.
errors.aut_no_token_provided: The user cannot be verified.  Log out of your account and log in again.
errors.aut_invalid_token: Your session has ended. Log out of your account and log in again.
errors.aut_no_user_info: The user information cannot be found.
errors.cld_search_not_found: The query information cannot be found.
errors.de_query_id_not_found: Query with provided ID was not found.

errors.invalid_parameter_type: Datasource configuration has changed. Reload the page.
errors.invalid_parameter-stix_conversion: The stix pattern cannot be converted to this datasource.

errors.exportBadRequest: We were unable to generate a valid URL for your file.

queries.checkConfigAdmin: Check the configuration of your data sources or get support within the IBM Support Portal.
queries.checkConfig: Contact your administrator to check the configuration or get support within the IBM Support Portal.

rerunWarning.heading: Some data sources are not available
rerunWarning.description: Some of the data sources for this query are no longer available. They may have been removed since this query was created.

cancelWarning.heading: Are you sure you want to cancel?
cancelWarning.description: Cancelling the operation will stop the search, but your query and the current results will be stored in the card.
cancelWarning.successNotificationSubtitle: The current search results can be viewed on the main search page
cancelWarning.errorNotificationSubtitle: Contact your administrator or try it later
cancelWarning.422NotificationSubtitle: You cannot cancel this query because it is already completed

removeWarning.heading: Are you sure you want to remove?
removeWarning.description: Removing your query will cause your query and search results be deleted.

notification.archiveFailed: Query could not be removed. Try again.
notification.undoArchiveFailed: Query could not be restored. Try again.
notification.dataExpiresTitle: Query result data is expired. Run the query again.
notification.dataAvailabilityStatusFailed: An unexpected error has occurred while retrieving your results. Please try again later.

errors.invalid_parameter: The datasource was unable to process a parameter.
errors.authentication_fail: You are unable to contact the data source.
errors.authentication_error: You are unable to contact the data source.
errors.invalid_permissions: You are unable to contact the data source.
errors.forbidden: You are unable to contact the data source.
errors.no_results: There are no results from the data source.
errors.mapping_error: The query could not be performed because the data source doesn't map to the indicators in the query
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while querying this data source.
errors.fallback: The datasource returned a status error without an explanation.
errors.missing: The datasource did not return any status information.

hunts.title: Unable to retrieve list of hunts
hunts.desc: There was a problem retrieving hunts.

placeholder.betaOff: Threat Hunt feature (beta) is set to off.

threatHuntPage.documentation: Review Kestrel Threat Hunting Language documentation

initialStep.title: Start your hunt by adding a step
initialStep.desc: Threat hunting in Data Explorer utilizes the new open source Kestrel Threat Hunting Language to work with all your data to find anomalies and potential threats in your environment.
initialStep.getStarted: Get started on your hunt by adding your first step.

empty.stepDesc: Continue your hunt by adding a step.

emptyStepContent.title: No results returned
emptyStepContent.desc: There was nothing there. Edit this step to try something else.

step.title: Unable to retrieve list of steps
step.desc: There was a problem retrieving steps.

variable.title: Unable to retrieve variables
variable.desc: There was a problem retrieving variables.

stepContent.title: Unable to display variables or snapshot
stepContent.desc: There was a problem retrieving data.

huntDialog.requiredName: Name is required and can't be more than {{NAME_MAX_LENGTH}} characters.
huntDialog.requiredDescription: Description is required and can't be more than {{DESC_MAX_LENGTH}} characters.
huntDialog.huntNamePlaceholder: Create a name for your hunt
huntDialog.huntDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a description for this hunt

threatHuntStepsTable.overflowMenuTitle: Threat hunt steps table overflow menu

threatHuntStep.subTitle: Build a Kestrel statement to explore your data.
threatHuntStep.commentPlaceholder: Write a note about this step
threatHuntStep.noVariablesMessage: This resource will be populated as you run steps.
threatHuntStep.errorVariablesSubtitle: Unable to get list of variables
threatHuntStep.errorVariablesText: There was a problem retrieving variables.
threatHuntStep.errorDataSourcesText: There was a problem retrieving data sources.
threatHuntStep.errorAnalyticsText: There was a problem retrieving analytics.
threatHuntStep.dataSourcesWarning: This data source is too busy to accept new queries. It will be queued until existing queries are processed.
threatHuntStep.dataSourcesError: This data source is in error state. Check data source configuration to resolve the issue.

find.selectText: FIND: find related entities within a variable

apply.selectText: APPLY: apply analytics on a variable

group.selectText: GROUP: group data by a column

copy.selectText: COPY: copy data to a new variable

dataSwitcher.label: Switcher for snapshot steps or variables

kestrelSyntaxError.unexpectedToken: Unexpected token  "{{token}}" at line {{line}} position {{column}}, expected {{expectedTokens}}
kestrelSyntaxError.unexpectedTokenNone: Syntax error at line {{line}} position {{column}}, expected {{expectedTokens}}

threatHuntAPIError.2: No valid configuration files can be found. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.4: Invalid STIX pattern. Rewrite the STIX pattern.
threatHuntAPIError.5: Variable does not exist. Check the variable used.
threatHuntAPIError.6: Unsupported relation. Check for supported relations and entity types in the documentation.
threatHuntAPIError.7: Unsupported STIX syntax. Rewrite the STIX pattern.
threatHuntAPIError.8: Execution abandoned due to empty variable. Rewrite the statement to use a non-empty variable as input.
threatHuntAPIError.9: Invalid attribute. Rewrite the statement with a valid attribute.
threatHuntAPIError.10: Input data does not have "type" column'. Add "type" column to data or specify entity type in the statement.
threatHuntAPIError.11: More than one entity type exists in input data. Provide homogeneous entities.
threatHuntAPIError.12: Failed to connect to the data source. Check URI for typographical errors.
threatHuntAPIError.14: Invalid data source. Check data source configuration.
threatHuntAPIError.15: Data source internal error. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.16: Data source interface does not exist. Check data source in statement.
threatHuntAPIError.17: Invalid data source interface implementation. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.18: Conflicting data source interface schemes. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.21: Unexpected analytics error. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.22: Analytics interface cannot be found. Check analytics name in the statement.
threatHuntAPIError.23: Invalid analytics interface implementation. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.24: Conflicting analytics interfaces. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.25: Incorrect analytics configurations. You must provide a valid variable.
threatHuntAPIError.601: Invalid Hunt ID "{{msg}}". You must provide a valid hunt ID.
threatHuntAPIError.602: Invalid Step Ordinal. You must provide a valid step ordinal.
threatHuntAPIError.603: Invalid Step ID "{{msg}}". You must provide a valid step ID.
threatHuntAPIError.604: Invalid Analytic Name. You must provide a valid analytic name.
threatHuntAPIError.605: Variable Not Found. This variable cannot be found.
threatHuntAPIError.606: Update Conflict. You cannot update a step that is in "queued" or "started" status.
threatHuntAPIError.607: Invalid Operation. This is an invalid operation.
threatHuntAPIError.608: Invalid access to threat hunting service. Contact your administrator.
threatHuntAPIError.609: Unauthorized User. You are not an authorized user.

dbWarningNotification.Title: Storage in Data Explorer is almost full
dbWarningNotification.subTitle: Please contact your administrator for assistance or refer to "Storage almost full alert" in Knowledge Center.

searchControlFlow.clusterBusy: The cluster is busy processing other requests and does not respond to your queries.

unavailableDataSources.infoWithOneSource: A data source is currently unavailable and therefore is not used for your search.
unavailableDataSources.infoWithMultiSources: Some data sources are currently unavailable and therefore are not used for your search.
unavailableDataSources.errorOneSource: Data Explorer cannot connect to a data source.
unavailableDataSources.errorMultiSources: {{countSources}} of {{totalSources}} sources are unavailable, please uncheck unavailable source to run a query.

customColumnTearsheet.mainDescription: Select all columns that you want to display. You can also drag and drop the columns to reposition them.
customColumnTearsheet.draggableTooltip: Drag and drop this item to change its order.
customColumnTearsheet.noColumnTitle: You have not selected any columns
customColumnTearsheet.noColumnDesc: From the <0>Available columns</0> list on the left panel, select the checkboxes in front of the columns that you want to include in the <0>Selected columns</0> list.
customColumnTearsheet.emptySearchResultSuggestion: Please try again with other keywords or narrow your searches

formNotAvailable.other: {{name}} enrichment would be disabled when there is no results in a search.
formNotAvailable.tis: Threat intel enrichment would be disabled when neither of the following observable type is not included: ipv4-addr, ipv6-addr, domain-name, url, network-traffic, or file.
formNotAvailable.sps: Suspicious process scoring enrichment only handles the process observable type and would be disabled when the process observable type is not included.

observableDropdown.title: Observable type
observableDropdown.label: Choose an observable type
observableDropdown.tooltip: The STIX 2.0 specification defines structured representations for observable objects and their properties in the cyber domain.

tis.name: Threat intel enrichment
tis.description: Add threat intelligence to STIX Cyber-observable Objects (SCOs) such as ipv4-addr, domain-name, url, and file.

outlierDetection.name: Outlier detection
outlierDetection.description: Outlier score is an aggregate value calculated based on source datasets. The score ranges from 0 to 1, where 0 represents most normal and 1 represents most abnormal.

zscore.title: zscore
zscore.tooltip: This method can only use a single numerical attributes as input

isolationforest.title: isolationforest
isolationforest.tooltip: Works with any number and type or property

suspiciousProcessScoring.name: Suspicious process scoring
suspiciousProcessScoring.description: Use numerical scores to rate process objects.

clustering.name: Clustering
clustering.description: Run cluster analysis for a set of objects.

success.title: Submission successful
success.subtitle: The enrichment job is created successfully.

error.title: Submission failed
error.subtitle: Failed to create enrichment job. Please try again later.

warning.subtitle: You can not create a new job when the previous one is still in progress. Please try again later.
